title: Wherever the S
clause_text: Wherever the S.R. Scheme sanctioned by CEO (SRA) is under progress on reservations shall be valid & continue.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Wherever the S.R. Scheme sanctioned by CEO (SRA) is under progress on reservations shall be valid & continue.
